title: Good vibes but little obvious progress as China shines at Ukraine talks in Saudi Arabia
description: Ukraine peace talks hosted by Saudi Arabia wrapped up this weekend yielding little progress in ending the war, but they did focus attention on China.

title: Bear escapes from crate in the cargo hold of an Iraqi plane, causing unbearable delay
description: Iraq’s prime minister has ordered an investigation into how a bear escaped from its crate in the cargo hold of an Iraqi aircraft as it was due to depart from Dubai airport, leaving passengers disgruntled over the delay and causing a stir on social media.

title: Mafia fugitive caught after police saw him celebrating his soccer team's victory
description: Vincenzo La Porta was arrested on Corfu after Italian police saw him celebrating Napoli's Serie A title.

title: Pink coffins with Barbie liners? It's on offer at an  El Salvador funeral home
description: A funeral home in Ahuachapán, El Salvador has taken Barbie mania to an extreme, offering pink coffins with Barbie linings.

title: China faces backlash after firing water cannon at U.S. ally's boat in disputed sea
description: The Philippines summoned China's ambassador after Beijing's navy blocked and fired water cannons at the U.S. ally’s vessels around the disputed Second Thomas Shoal.

title: Netanyahu says he is willing to change part of his controversial judicial overhaul
description: According to a recent Bloomberg interview, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu appears to be pulling back on parts of his controversial judicial overhaul that has sparked mass protests across the country. NBC News’ Raf Sanchez reports from Tel Aviv.

title: Tens of thousands of young scouts to evacuate from world jamboree as storm looms
description: South Korea is preparing to evacuate tens of thousands of scouts from a coastal jamboree site as Tropical Storm Khanun looms, officials said Monday.

title: North Korea's Kim tours weapons factories and vows to advance war readiness
description: North Korean leader Kim toured the country’s key weapons factories and pledged to speed up efforts to advance arms and war readiness, state media said Sunday.

title: China water-cannons Philippine military ship in the South China Sea
description: According to video released by the Philippine Coast Guard, a Chinese military vessel fired a water cannon toward a Philippine ship in the South China Sea. China said it was acting lawfully by trying to deter the Philippine ships, accusing them of trespassing and carrying illegal building materials.
